The plug-in converter throws a PluginConversionException that wraps the
SAXParseException. PDE handles/should handle it. Moving to PDE/UI.

having a hard time reproducing.

Could you please attach the bogus plugin.xml.  thanks.
was not able to reproduce and the plugin.xml was not supplied.

traces.message: The reference to entity "tor" must end with the ';' delimiter.
